[thumb](/fileSpiritshiftPng/) The [druid](/druid/) can assume a variety of anthropomorphized forms, with new abilities inspired by the emulated [creature](/creature/). Druids cannot hold weapons while spiritshifted, but they can always cast spells. Spiritshifts deal damage of a different type depending on the form, and are granted unique abilities and items. The exact duration is 15 seconds, increased by 5% for each point of the character's [Intellect](/intellect/). The spirit form is chosen during [Character Creation](/characterCreation/), as part of class selection. ## Spirit forms Druids choose a spirit form at character creation.
